query.sql:
WITH 

vw_user_custom_fields as
(
select 
  user_id as user_uid,
  name as custom_field_uid,
  value as custom_field_value
from 
  user_custom_fields 
where
  name like 'user_field%'
),

vw_user_fields as
(
select 
  concat('user_field_',id) as custom_field_uid,
  name as custom_field_name
from 
  user_fields
)

select 
  u.username,
  custom_field_name as key,
  custom_field_value as value
from 
  vw_user_custom_fields ucf
join
  vw_user_fields uf
on
  ucf.custom_field_uid = uf.custom_field_uid
join
  users u
on 
  ucf.user_uid = u.id
query.name: Get all custom user fields for all users
